print ' '.join('''
				-- Part 1: Ran Work Orders |
				SELECT t1.*
				FROM
					
				(	
					SELECT 
						s.ID as 'ScheduleId'
						,s.LineID
						,s.WorkOrderID as 'MESWorkOrderId'
						,s.ScheduleType
						,(CASE
							WHEN ISNULL(`r`.`RunStopDateTime`) THEN `s`.`ScheduleStartDateTime`
							WHEN (`r`.`RunStopDateTime` IS NOT NULL) THEN `r`.`RunStartDateTime`
						END) AS `ScheduleStartDateTime`
						,(CASE
							WHEN ISNULL(`r`.`RunStopDateTime`) THEN `s`.`ScheduleFinishDateTime`
							WHEN (`r`.`RunStopDateTime` IS NOT NULL) THEN `r`.`RunStopDateTime`
						END) AS `ScheduleFinishDateTime` 
						,s.Quantity AS ScheduledQty
						,CEILING((s.ScheduleRate * 60.0)) AS ScheduleRate
						,s.SetupMins AS SetupMins
						,r.ID AS 'RunID'
						,ROUND(
							TIMESTAMPDIFF(
								SECOND
								,r.RunStartDateTime
								,r.RunStopDateTime
							) / 3600
							,2
						) AS StdHrs
						,1 AS 'Released'
						,s.Note
						,(CASE
							WHEN (r.RunStopDateTime IS NULL) THEN 0
							WHEN (r.RunStopDateTime IS NOT NULL) THEN 1
						END) AS Completed
						,1 AS NewSystem
						,oel.OrderEntryWorkOrderId
						,oel.OrderEntryWorkorderPass AS 'WorkOrderPass'
						,oel.OrderEntryWorkorderSeq AS 'WorkOrderSequence'
						,mos.Status AS 'ManufacturingOrderStatusVal'
						,moc.StatusDescription AS 'ManufacturingOrderStatus'
						,mos.Sequence AS 'ManufacturingOrderSequence'
						,moc.BackgroundColor
						,moc.ForegroundColor
						,0 AS 'FilmStatus'
						,r.EndReason
						-- Work Order Check Columns |
						,woc.ID AS 'wocID', woc.MountingApproved, woc.MountingDate, woc.MountingUser, woc.MountingLogID, woc.InkApproved, woc.InkDate, woc.InkUser, woc.InkLogID, woc.PlateApproved, woc.PlateDate, woc.PlateUser, woc.PlateLogID, woc.SampleApproved, woc.SampleDate, woc.SampleUser, woc.SampleLogID, woc.FilmAvailableApproved, woc.FilmAvailableDate, woc.FilmAvailableUser, woc.FilmAvailableLogID, woc.PlateInspectionApproved, woc.PlateInspectionDate, woc.PlateInspectionUser, woc.PlateInspectionLogID, woc.ShiftNotesLogID, woc.PlanningNotesID
					FROM 
						mes_lite.run r 
						INNER JOIN mes_lite.schedule s ON
							s.ID = r.ScheduleID
						INNER JOIN mes_custom.orderentrylink oel ON
							oel.MESWorkOrderId = s.WorkOrderID
						INNER JOIN mes_custom.manufacturingorder_status mos ON
							mos.ManufacturingOrderID = oel.OrderEntryManOrderID
						INNER JOIN mes_custom.manufacturingorder_config moc ON
							moc.StatusValue = mos.Status
						LEFT JOIN mes_custom.workorder_checks woc ON
							woc.ManufacturingOrderID = oel.OrderEntryWorkOrderID
					WHERE
						r.EndReason <= 3
						AND r.RunStopDateTime IS NOT NULL
						AND r.RunStartDateTime >= '2024-08-15 07:00:00' -- Week Start |
						AND r.RunStartDateTime <= '2024-12-04 23:59:59' -- Rolling Week End |
						AND s.LineId = 1
						AND s.NewSystem = 1
						AND woc.JobJacket = -1 
						AND woc.ManufacturingOrderID != -1 
				) AS t1
			
					LEFT JOIN mes_lite.run r ON 
						r.ID = t1.RunId
				-- Make sure duplicates do not show up when there are multiple runs |
				WHERE
					t1.ScheduleId NOT IN (SELECT schedule_id FROM mes_custom.vw_schedule_exception WHERE exception_state not in (3,5)) -- Don't show if any exception state other than cleared or rescheduled |
					AND (	
						t1.RunID IS NULL -- Not Run yet |	
						OR	
						r.RunStopDateTime IS NULL -- Currently Running |	
						OR	
						(t1.RunID IS NOT NULL AND t1.ScheduleStartDateTime = r.RunStartDateTime) -- Ran |	
					)	
				UNION
				-- Part 2: Exceptions |
				SELECT t1.*
				FROM
					
			(
				SELECT
					vse.schedule_id AS 'ScheduleID'
					,vse.LineID
					,oel.MESWorkOrderID AS MESWorkOrderId
					,s.ScheduleType
					,(CASE
						WHEN ISNULL(`r`.`RunStopDateTime`) THEN `s`.`ScheduleStartDateTime`
						WHEN (`r`.`RunStopDateTime` IS NOT NULL) THEN `r`.`RunStartDateTime`
					END) AS `ScheduleStartDateTime`
					,(CASE
						WHEN ISNULL(`r`.`RunStopDateTime`) THEN `s`.`ScheduleFinishDateTime`
						WHEN (`r`.`RunStopDateTime` IS NOT NULL) THEN `r`.`RunStopDateTime`
					END) AS `ScheduleFinishDateTime` 
					,s.Quantity AS ScheduledQty
					,CEILING((s.ScheduleRate * 60.0)) AS ScheduleRate
					,s.SetupMins AS SetupMins
					,r.ID AS RunID
					,ROUND(
						TIMESTAMPDIFF(
							SECOND
							,r.RunStartDateTime
							,r.RunStopDateTime
						) / 3600
						,2
					) AS StdHrs
					,1 AS Released
					,s.Note AS Note
					,(CASE
						WHEN ISNULL(r.RunStopDateTime) THEN 0
						WHEN (r.RunStopDateTime IS NOT NULL) THEN 1
					END) AS Completed
					,1 AS NewSystem
					,oel.OrderEntryWorkOrderId
					,oel.OrderEntryWorkorderPass AS 'WorkOrderPass'
					,oel.OrderEntryWorkorderSeq AS 'WorkOrderSequence'
					,mos.Status AS 'ManufacturingOrderStatusVal'
					,moc.StatusDescription AS 'ManufacturingOrderStatus'
					,mos.Sequence AS 'ManufacturingOrderSequence'
					,moc.BackgroundColor
					,moc.ForegroundColor
					,0 AS 'FilmStatus'
					,(CASE
						WHEN ISNULL(r.EndReason) THEN 17 -- Skipped Job |
						WHEN (r.EndReason IS NOT NULL) THEN r.EndReason
					END) AS EndReason
					-- Work Order Check Columns |
					,woc.ID AS 'wocID', woc.MountingApproved, woc.MountingDate, woc.MountingUser, woc.MountingLogID, woc.InkApproved, woc.InkDate, woc.InkUser, woc.InkLogID, woc.PlateApproved, woc.PlateDate, woc.PlateUser, woc.PlateLogID, woc.SampleApproved, woc.SampleDate, woc.SampleUser, woc.SampleLogID, woc.FilmAvailableApproved, woc.FilmAvailableDate, woc.FilmAvailableUser, woc.FilmAvailableLogID, woc.PlateInspectionApproved, woc.PlateInspectionDate, woc.PlateInspectionUser, woc.PlateInspectionLogID, woc.ShiftNotesLogID, woc.PlanningNotesID
				FROM 
					mes_custom.vw_schedule_exception vse
					INNER JOIN mes_lite.schedule s ON
						s.ID = vse.schedule_id
					INNER JOIN mes_custom.orderentrylink oel ON
						oel.MESWorkOrderId = s.WorkOrderID
					INNER JOIN mes_custom.manufacturingorder_status mos ON
						mos.ManufacturingOrderID = oel.OrderEntryManOrderID
					INNER JOIN mes_custom.manufacturingorder_config moc ON
						moc.StatusValue = mos.Status
					LEFT JOIN mes_custom.workorder_checks woc ON
						woc.ManufacturingOrderID = oel.OrderEntryWorkOrderID
					LEFT JOIN mes_lite.run r ON
						r.scheduleId = s.ID 
						
						
				WHERE 
					vse.exception_state in (1,2)
					AND s.LineId = 1
					AND s.NewSystem = 1
					AND woc.JobJacket = -1 
					AND woc.ManufacturingOrderID != -1 
				) AS t1
			
					LEFT JOIN mes_lite.run r ON
						r.ID = t1.RunId	
				WHERE
					(	
						t1.RunID IS NULL -- Not Run yet |	
						OR	
						r.RunStopDateTime IS NULL -- Currently Running |	
						OR	
						(t1.RunID IS NOT NULL AND t1.ScheduleStartDateTime = r.RunStartDateTime) -- Ran |	
					)	
				UNION
				-- Part 3: Scheduled to Run |
				SELECT t1.*
				FROM
					
				(	
					SELECT 
						srd.ScheduleID as 'ScheduleId'
						,srd.LineID
						,srd.WorkOrderID as 'MESWorkOrderId'
						,srd.ScheduleType

							WHEN ISNULL(`r`.`RunStopDateTime`) THEN `srd`.`ScheduleStartDateTime`
							WHEN (`r`.`RunStopDateTime` IS NOT NULL) THEN `r`.`RunStartDateTime`
						END) AS `ScheduleStartDateTime`
						,(CASE
							WHEN ISNULL(`r`.`RunStopDateTime`) THEN `srd`.`ScheduleFinishDateTime`
							WHEN (`r`.`RunStopDateTime` IS NOT NULL) THEN `r`.`RunStopDateTime`
						END) AS `ScheduleFinishDateTime` 
						,srd.ScheduledQuantity AS ScheduledQty
						,CEILING((srd.ScheduleRate * 60.0)) AS ScheduleRate
						,srd.SetupMins AS SetupMins
						,r.ID AS 'RunID'
						,ROUND(
							TIMESTAMPDIFF(
								SECOND,
								(CASE
									WHEN (r.RunStopDateTime IS NULL) THEN srd.ScheduleStartDateTime
									WHEN (r.RunStopDateTime IS NOT NULL) THEN r.RunStartDateTime
								END),
								(CASE
									WHEN (r.RunStopDateTime IS NULL) THEN srd.ScheduleFinishDateTime
									WHEN (r.RunStopDateTime IS NOT NULL) THEN r.RunStopDateTime
								END)
							) / 3600
							,2
						) AS 'StdHrs'
						,1 AS 'Released'
						,srd.Note
						,(CASE
							WHEN (r.RunStopDateTime IS NULL) THEN 0
							WHEN (r.RunStopDateTime IS NOT NULL) THEN 1
						END) AS Completed
						,1 AS NewSystem
						,oel.OrderEntryWorkOrderId
						,oel.OrderEntryWorkorderPass AS 'WorkOrderPass'
						,oel.OrderEntryWorkorderSeq AS 'WorkOrderSequence'
						,mos.Status AS 'ManufacturingOrderStatusVal'
						,moc.StatusDescription AS 'ManufacturingOrderStatus'
						,mos.Sequence AS 'ManufacturingOrderSequence'
						,moc.BackgroundColor
						,moc.ForegroundColor
						,0 AS 'FilmStatus'
						,r.EndReason
						-- Work Order Check Columns |
						,woc.ID AS 'wocID', woc.MountingApproved, woc.MountingDate, woc.MountingUser, woc.MountingLogID, woc.InkApproved, woc.InkDate, woc.InkUser, woc.InkLogID, woc.PlateApproved, woc.PlateDate, woc.PlateUser, woc.PlateLogID, woc.SampleApproved, woc.SampleDate, woc.SampleUser, woc.SampleLogID, woc.FilmAvailableApproved, woc.FilmAvailableDate, woc.FilmAvailableUser, woc.FilmAvailableLogID, woc.PlateInspectionApproved, woc.PlateInspectionDate, woc.PlateInspectionUser, woc.PlateInspectionLogID, woc.ShiftNotesLogID, woc.PlanningNotesID
					FROM

										SELECT 
											sr.StartDate, max(sr.ID) AS ScheduleReleaseId
										FROM 
											mes_custom.schedule_release_detail srd
											INNER JOIN mes_custom.schedule_release sr ON
												sr.ID = srd.ScheduleReleaseID AND sr.Released = 1
											LEFT JOIN mes_lite.schedule s ON
												s.ID = srd.ScheduleID
										WHERE 
											sr.StartDate = '2023-01-01 07:00:00'
											-- Updates made it such that releases are only against 2023-01-01 07:00:00
											-- sr.StartDate >= '2024-08-15 07:00:00' -- Week Start |
											-- AND sr.StartDate <= '2024-12-04 23:59:59' -- Rolling Week End |
											AND srd.LineId = 1
											AND (s.NewSystem in (0,1) or (s.NewSystem is NULL AND srd.IUD = 3))
										GROUP BY

									) t
								)

								AND srd.Active = 1
						) maxsr
						INNER JOIN mes_custom.schedule_release_detail srd ON
							srd.ScheduleReleaseID = maxsr.ScheduleReleaseId AND srd.ScheduleId = maxsr.ScheduleId AND srd.IUD <> 3  
						INNER JOIN mes_custom.orderentrylink oel ON
							oel.MESWorkOrderId = srd.WorkOrderID
						INNER JOIN mes_custom.manufacturingorder_status mos ON
							mos.ManufacturingOrderID = oel.OrderEntryManOrderID
						INNER JOIN mes_custom.manufacturingorder_config moc ON
							moc.StatusValue = mos.Status
						LEFT JOIN mes_custom.workorder_checks woc ON
							woc.ManufacturingOrderID = oel.OrderEntryWorkOrderID
						LEFT JOIN mes_lite.run r ON
							r.scheduleId = maxsr.ScheduleId
					WHERE
						srd.ScheduleId NOT IN (SELECT schedule_id FROM mes_custom.vw_schedule_exception WHERE exception_state not in (3,5))
						AND woc.JobJacket = -1 
						AND woc.ManufacturingOrderID != -1  
				) AS t1
			
					LEFT JOIN mes_lite.run r ON 
						r.ID = t1.RunId
				-- Make sure duplicates do not show up when there are multiple runs |
				WHERE
					-- t1.ScheduleId NOT IN (SELECT schedule_id FROM mes_custom.vw_schedule_exception WHERE exception_state not in (3,5)) -- Don't show if any exception state other than cleared or rescheduled|	
					-- AND | 
					(	
						t1.RunID IS NULL -- Not Run yet |	
						OR	
						r.RunStopDateTime IS NULL -- Currently Running |	
						OR	
						(t1.RunID IS NOT NULL AND t1.ScheduleStartDateTime = r.RunStartDateTime) -- Ran |	
					)
				ORDER BY 
					ScheduleStartDateTime ASC
			'''.split()).replace('--','\n--').replace('|','|\n')

				UNION

					,dbo.Operation.OperationName
					,dbo.Operation.OperationDesc
					,dbo.OperationAssetGroup.OperationAssetGroupId as AssetId
					,dbo.OperationAssetGroup.OperationAssetGroupName as AssetName
					,dbo.ManufacturingOrderRouteLink.PassNo
					,dbo.ManufacturingOrderRouteLink.SequenceNo

					,COMBOFGItemVersion.ItemDescription AS 'WorkOrderItemDescription'

					--,ROUND(WorkOrder.Quantity * (1 + dbo.StandardVariables.StandardVariableValue),0) AS 'FT' |

					INNER JOIN dbo.ItemVersion FGItemVersion on FGItemVersion.itemversionid = dbo.manufacturingorder.FGItemVersionId

					INNER JOIN dbo.SalesOrderItem on dbo.SalesOrderItem.SalesOrderItemId = dbo.SalesOrderLink.SalesOrderItemId
					--INNER JOIN dbo.SalesOrderItem on dbo.SalesOrderItem.ITemVersionId = FGItemVersion.ItemVersionId |

						where manufacturingorderid = dbo.fn_select_MO_forcombomo(COMBO.ManufacturingOrderId) and operationid in (6))
					LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ItemName, wbi.PrimaryInputWidth, wbi.bomversionId, wbi.ItemVersionId from WorkOrderBomItem wbi inner join
					vw_ItemVersion viv on wbi.ItemVersionId = viv.ItemVersionId
					where viv.ItemClassId = 4
					and wbi.primaryinput = 1) bomFilm on bomFilm.BomVersionId = WorkOrderBomLink.BomVersionId
					LEFT OUTER JOIN (select top(1) RequisitionId, RequisitionNumber, MaterialDueDate, Requisition.WorkOrderId, Requisition.BOMItemVersionId, Requisition.MaterialAvailable from Requisition inner join
					ItemVersion on ItemVersion.ItemVersionId = Requisition.BOMItemVersionId inner join
					WorkOrder on WorkOrder.WorkOrderId = Requisition.WorkOrderId
					Where Requisition.ReqActive = 1 and Requisition.RequisitionStateId in (1,3)
					) req on req.WorkOrderId = WorkOrder.WorkOrderId and req.BOMItemVersionId = bomFilm.ItemVersionId
					LEFT OUTER JOIN(
						SELECT ItemVersionId, ISNULL([139],0) as 'NumColors', ISNULL([147],0) as 'ProcessPrint', 
						ISNULL([293],0) as 'Trim', ISNULL([145], 0) as 'FilmWidth', ISNULL([279], 0) as 'CoreSize', ISNULL([334],0) as 'InkSystem',
						ISNULL([227],'') as 'PrintType'
						FROM(

						) as a
						PIVOT(

						) as PivotTable
					) ia
						ON ia.ItemVersionId = dbo.ItemGraphicValues.ItemVersionId
					LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.StandardVariables ON dbo.StandardVariables.StandardVariableId = 1
					LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.ItemWIPLink ON dbo.ItemWIPLink.ManufacturingOrderId = COMBO.ManufacturingOrderId AND dbo.ItemWIPLink.WorkOrderId = COMBOWO.WorkOrderId
					LEFT OUTER JOIN [mes_run_data].[dbo].[InventoryMaster] ON [mes_run_data].[dbo].[InventoryMaster].[Master Item No] = dbo.ItemWIPLink.ShopFloorID
					LEFT JOIN dbo.vw_PouchForm ON dbo.vw_PouchForm.ItemVersionId = COMBO.FGItemVersionId
				
				WHERE
					dbo.ManufacturingOrder.ManufacturingOrderId IN (
					select ManufacturingOrderId from vw_manufacturingorder 
					)
					AND dbo.Operation.OperationId IN ( select * from STRING_SPLIT('6', ',') ) --6:Printing, 7:Laminating, (8,35,36,37,38):Slitting, 9:Bag Making |
					AND dbo.ManufacturingOrder.ManufacturingOrderClassId = 7 --'COMBO LINKED - this MO is linked to a COMBO MO' |
					AND combo.manufacturingorderclassid = 3 --'COMBO MO Classification' |
					AND combowo.operationid IN ( select * from STRING_SPLIT('6', ',') )
				
				ORDER BY 
					ManufacturingOrderId
					,WorkOrderId
			'''.split()).replace('--','\n--').replace('|','|\n')

print ' '.join('''
				-- Part 1: Ran Work Orders |
				SELECT 
					t1.*,
					jjscurrent.JobStatus,
					jjscurrent.Sequence,
					jjsconfig.JobStatusDesc, 
					jjsconfig.BackgroundColor, 
					jjsconfig.ForegroundColor,
					0 AS 'FilmStatus',
					0 AS 'IUD',
					0 AS 'LockedRow',
					r.EndReason
					-- Work Order Check Columns |
					,woc.ID AS 'wocID', woc.MountingApproved, woc.MountingDate, woc.MountingUser, woc.MountingLogID, woc.InkApproved, woc.InkDate, woc.InkUser, woc.InkLogID, woc.PlateApproved, woc.PlateDate, woc.PlateUser, woc.PlateLogID, woc.SampleApproved, woc.SampleDate, woc.SampleUser, woc.SampleLogID, woc.FilmAvailableApproved, woc.FilmAvailableDate, woc.FilmAvailableUser, woc.FilmAvailableLogID, woc.PlateInspectionApproved, woc.PlateInspectionDate, woc.PlateInspectionUser, woc.PlateInspectionLogID, woc.ShiftNotesLogID, woc.PlanningNotesID			
					FROM 
				(
					SELECT
						r.ScheduleId
						,s.LineID
						,-1 AS ManufacturingOrderId
						,sd.JobNum AS ManufacturingOrderNumber
						,wo.ID AS MESWorkOrderId
						,-1 AS OEWorkOrderId
						,sd.ReferenceItemNo AS WorkOrderNumber
						,'' AS ReferenceItemNumber
						,-1 AS WorkOrderItemVersionId
						,-1 AS FGItemVersionId
						,'' AS FGItemVersionStateName
						,sd.Customer
						,sd.ItemDesc
						,r.RunStartDateTime AS `ScheduleStartDateTime`
						,r.RunStopDateTime AS `ScheduleFinishDateTime` 
						,s.Quantity AS ScheduledQty
						,CEILING((s.ScheduleRate * 60.0)) AS ScheduleRate
						,s.SetupMins AS SetupMins
						,r.ID AS RunID
						,sd.FT AS FT
						,DATE_FORMAT(sd.HRD, '%m/%d/%Y') AS HRD
						,ROUND(
							TIMESTAMPDIFF(
								SECOND
								,r.RunStartDateTime
								,r.RunStopDateTime
							) / 3600
							,2
						) AS StdHrs
						,sd.FilmSize AS FilmSize
						,sd.FilmDesc AS FilmDesc
						-- start variable headers |
						
					,sd.Colors AS Colors
					,CASE
						WHEN ss.Repeat IS NULL AND (REGEXP_LIKE(sd.SleeveSize, '^[0-9]+\.?[0-9]*$') = 1) THEN FORMAT(sd.SleeveSize,4)
						WHEN ss.Repeat IS NULL AND (REGEXP_LIKE(sd.SleeveSize, '^[0-9]+\.?[0-9]*$') = 0) THEN sd.SleeveSize
						ELSE FORMAT(ss.Repeat,4)
					END
					AS SleeveSize
					,sd.Type AS Type
					,sd.PrintType AS PrintType
					,sd.FilmWidth AS FilmWidth
					,sd.FilmLFAvailable AS FilmAvailable
					,sd.ProcessPrint AS ProcessPrint
					-- ,'' AS Press |
					,'' AS BCD
					,'' AS PlateMaterial
				
						-- end variable headers |
						,1 AS Released
						,s.Note AS Note
						,(CASE
							WHEN ISNULL(r.RunStopDateTime) THEN 0
							WHEN (r.RunStopDateTime IS NOT NULL) THEN 1
						END) AS Completed
						,0 AS NewSystem
						,(CASE
							WHEN
								(LEFT(RIGHT(sd.ReferenceItemNo, 2)
									,1) = 1)
							THEN
								6
							WHEN
								(LEFT(RIGHT(sd.ReferenceItemNo, 2)
									,1) = 2)
							THEN
								7
							WHEN
								(LEFT(RIGHT(sd.ReferenceItemNo, 2)
									,1) = 3)
							THEN
								8
							ELSE 0
						END) AS OperationId
						,-1 AS WorkOrderPass
						,-1 AS WorkOrderSequence
					FROM 
						mes_lite.run r
						INNER JOIN mes_lite.schedule s ON
							s.ID = r.ScheduleId
						INNER JOIN mes_lite.workorder wo ON
							wo.ID = s.WorkOrderID
						INNER JOIN mes_custom.schedule_detail_print sd ON
							sd.ReferenceItemNo = wo.WorkOrder AND sd.Active = 1
						
					LEFT JOIN mes_custom.sleevesizing ss ON 
						ss.Gear = sd.SleeveSize
						OR ss.Repeat = sd.SleeveSize
				
					WHERE 
						r.EndReason <= 3
						AND r.RunStopDateTime IS NOT NULL
						AND r.RunStartDateTime >= '2024-08-15 07:00:00' -- Week Start |
						AND r.RunStartDateTime <= '2024-12-04 23:59:59' -- Rolling Week End |
						AND s.LineId = 1
						AND s.NewSystem = 0
					) AS t1
								
						INNER JOIN mes_custom.jobjacketstatuscurrent jjscurrent ON 
							jjscurrent.JobJacket = t1.ManufacturingOrderNumber
						INNER JOIN mes_custom.jobjacketstatusconfig AS jjsconfig ON 
							jjscurrent.JobStatus = jjsconfig.StatusValue
						LEFT JOIN mes_custom.workorder_checks as woc ON 
							woc.JobJacket = t1.WorkOrderNumber
						LEFT JOIN mes_lite.run as r ON
							r.ID = t1.RunId
				-- Make sure duplicates do not show up when there are multiple runs |
				WHERE
					t1.ScheduleId NOT IN (SELECT schedule_id FROM mes_custom.vw_schedule_exception WHERE exception_state not in (3,5)) -- Don't show if any exception state other than cleared or rescheduled |	
					AND woc.JobJacket != -1 
					AND woc.ManufacturingOrderID = -1 
					AND (	
						t1.RunID IS NULL -- Not Run yet |	
						OR	
						r.RunStopDateTime IS NULL -- Currently Running |	
						OR	
						(t1.RunID IS NOT NULL AND t1.ScheduleStartDateTime = r.RunStartDateTime) -- Ran |	
					)	
				UNION	
				-- Part 2: Exceptions |
				SELECT 
					t1.*,
					jjscurrent.JobStatus,
					jjscurrent.Sequence,
					jjsconfig.JobStatusDesc, 
					jjsconfig.BackgroundColor, 
					jjsconfig.ForegroundColor,
					0 AS 'FilmStatus',
					0 AS 'IUD',
					0 AS 'LockedRow',
					(CASE
						WHEN ISNULL(r.EndReason) THEN 17 -- Skipped Job |
						WHEN (r.EndReason IS NOT NULL) THEN r.EndReason
					END) AS EndReason
					-- Work Order Check Columns |
					,woc.ID AS 'wocID', woc.MountingApproved, woc.MountingDate, woc.MountingUser, woc.MountingLogID, woc.InkApproved, woc.InkDate, woc.InkUser, woc.InkLogID, woc.PlateApproved, woc.PlateDate, woc.PlateUser, woc.PlateLogID, woc.SampleApproved, woc.SampleDate, woc.SampleUser, woc.SampleLogID, woc.FilmAvailableApproved, woc.FilmAvailableDate, woc.FilmAvailableUser, woc.FilmAvailableLogID, woc.PlateInspectionApproved, woc.PlateInspectionDate, woc.PlateInspectionUser, woc.PlateInspectionLogID, woc.ShiftNotesLogID, woc.PlanningNotesID			
					FROM 
				(
					SELECT
						vse.schedule_id
						,vse.LineID
						,-1 AS ManufacturingOrderId
						,sd.JobNum AS ManufacturingOrderNumber
						,wo.ID AS MESWorkOrderId
						,-1 AS OEWorkOrderId
						,sd.ReferenceItemNo AS WorkOrderNumber
						,'' AS ReferenceItemNumber
						,-1 AS WorkOrderItemVersionId
						,-1 AS FGItemVersionId
						,'' AS FGItemVersionStateName
						,sd.Customer
						,sd.ItemDesc
						,(CASE
							WHEN ISNULL(`r`.`RunStopDateTime`) THEN `s`.`ScheduleStartDateTime`
							WHEN (`r`.`RunStopDateTime` IS NOT NULL) THEN `r`.`RunStartDateTime`
						END) AS `ScheduleStartDateTime`
						,(CASE
							WHEN ISNULL(`r`.`RunStopDateTime`) THEN `s`.`ScheduleFinishDateTime`
							WHEN (`r`.`RunStopDateTime` IS NOT NULL) THEN `r`.`RunStopDateTime`
						END) AS `ScheduleFinishDateTime` 
						,s.Quantity AS ScheduledQty
						,CEILING((s.ScheduleRate * 60.0)) AS ScheduleRate
						,s.SetupMins AS SetupMins
						,r.ID AS RunID
						,sd.FT AS FT
						,DATE_FORMAT(sd.HRD, '%m/%d/%Y') AS HRD
						,ROUND(
							TIMESTAMPDIFF(
								SECOND
								,r.RunStartDateTime
								,r.RunStopDateTime
							) / 3600
							,2
						) AS StdHrs
						,sd.FilmSize AS FilmSize
						,sd.FilmDesc AS FilmDesc
						-- start variable headers |
						
					,sd.Colors AS Colors
					,CASE
						WHEN ss.Repeat IS NULL AND (REGEXP_LIKE(sd.SleeveSize, '^[0-9]+\.?[0-9]*$') = 1) THEN FORMAT(sd.SleeveSize,4)
						WHEN ss.Repeat IS NULL AND (REGEXP_LIKE(sd.SleeveSize, '^[0-9]+\.?[0-9]*$') = 0) THEN sd.SleeveSize
						ELSE FORMAT(ss.Repeat,4)
					END
					AS SleeveSize
					,sd.Type AS Type
					,sd.PrintType AS PrintType
					,sd.FilmWidth AS FilmWidth
					,sd.FilmLFAvailable AS FilmAvailable
					,sd.ProcessPrint AS ProcessPrint
					-- ,'' AS Press |
					,'' AS BCD
					,'' AS PlateMaterial
				
						-- end variable headers |
						,1 AS Released
						,s.Note AS Note
						,(CASE
							WHEN ISNULL(r.RunStopDateTime) THEN 0
							WHEN (r.RunStopDateTime IS NOT NULL) THEN 1
						END) AS Completed
						,0 AS NewSystem
						,(CASE
							WHEN
								(LEFT(RIGHT(sd.ReferenceItemNo, 2)
									,1) = 1)
							THEN
								6
							WHEN
								(LEFT(RIGHT(sd.ReferenceItemNo, 2)
									,1) = 2)
							THEN
								7
							WHEN
								(LEFT(RIGHT(sd.ReferenceItemNo, 2)
									,1) = 3)
							THEN
								8
							ELSE 0
						END) AS OperationId
						,-1 AS WorkOrderPass
						,-1 AS WorkOrderSequence
					FROM 
						mes_custom.vw_schedule_exception vse
						INNER JOIN mes_lite.schedule s ON
							s.ID = vse.schedule_id
						INNER JOIN mes_lite.workorder wo ON
							wo.ID = s.WorkOrderID
						INNER JOIN mes_custom.schedule_detail_print sd ON
							sd.ReferenceItemNo = wo.WorkOrder AND sd.Active = 1
						LEFT JOIN mes_lite.run r ON
							r.scheduleId = vse.schedule_id
						
					LEFT JOIN mes_custom.sleevesizing ss ON 
						ss.Gear = sd.SleeveSize
						OR ss.Repeat = sd.SleeveSize
				
					WHERE 
						vse.exception_state <= 2
						AND s.LineId = 1
						AND s.NewSystem = 0
					) AS t1
								
						INNER JOIN mes_custom.jobjacketstatuscurrent jjscurrent ON 
							jjscurrent.JobJacket = t1.ManufacturingOrderNumber
						INNER JOIN mes_custom.jobjacketstatusconfig AS jjsconfig ON 
							jjscurrent.JobStatus = jjsconfig.StatusValue
						LEFT JOIN mes_custom.workorder_checks as woc ON 
							woc.JobJacket = t1.WorkOrderNumber 
						LEFT JOIN mes_lite.run as r ON
							r.ID = t1.RunId
					WHERE 
					woc.JobJacket != -1 
					AND woc.ManufacturingOrderID = -1 
				UNION
				-- Part 3: Scheduled to Run |
				SELECT 
					t1.*,
					jjscurrent.JobStatus,
					jjscurrent.Sequence,
					jjsconfig.JobStatusDesc, 
					jjsconfig.BackgroundColor, 
					jjsconfig.ForegroundColor,
					0 AS 'FilmStatus',
					0 AS 'IUD',
					0 AS 'LockedRow',
					r.EndReason
					-- Work Order Check Columns |
					,woc.ID AS 'wocID', woc.MountingApproved, woc.MountingDate, woc.MountingUser, woc.MountingLogID, woc.InkApproved, woc.InkDate, woc.InkUser, woc.InkLogID, woc.PlateApproved, woc.PlateDate, woc.PlateUser, woc.PlateLogID, woc.SampleApproved, woc.SampleDate, woc.SampleUser, woc.SampleLogID, woc.FilmAvailableApproved, woc.FilmAvailableDate, woc.FilmAvailableUser, woc.FilmAvailableLogID, woc.PlateInspectionApproved, woc.PlateInspectionDate, woc.PlateInspectionUser, woc.PlateInspectionLogID, woc.ShiftNotesLogID, woc.PlanningNotesID			
					FROM 
				(
					SELECT
						srd.ScheduleId
						,srd.LineID
						,-1 AS ManufacturingOrderId
						,sd.JobNum AS ManufacturingOrderNumber
						,wo.ID AS MESWorkOrderId
						,-1 AS OEWorkOrderId
						,sd.ReferenceItemNo AS WorkOrderNumber
						,'' AS ReferenceItemNumber
						,-1 AS WorkOrderItemVersionId
						,-1 AS FGItemVersionId
						,'' AS FGItemVersionStateName
						,sd.Customer
						,sd.ItemDesc
						,(CASE
							WHEN ISNULL(`r`.`RunStopDateTime`) THEN `srd`.`ScheduleStartDateTime`
							WHEN (`r`.`RunStopDateTime` IS NOT NULL) THEN `r`.`RunStartDateTime`
						END) AS `ScheduleStartDateTime`
						,(CASE
							WHEN ISNULL(`r`.`RunStopDateTime`) THEN `srd`.`ScheduleFinishDateTime`
							WHEN (`r`.`RunStopDateTime` IS NOT NULL) THEN `r`.`RunStopDateTime`
						END) AS `ScheduleFinishDateTime` 
						,srd.ScheduledQuantity AS ScheduledQty
						,CEILING((srd.ScheduleRate * 60.0)) AS ScheduleRate
						,srd.SetupMins AS SetupMins
						,r.ID AS RunID
						,sd.FT AS FT
						,DATE_FORMAT(sd.HRD, '%m/%d/%Y') AS HRD
						,ROUND((TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND
									,(CASE
										WHEN ISNULL(r.RunStopDateTime) THEN srd.ScheduleStartDateTime
										WHEN (r.RunStopDateTime IS NOT NULL) THEN r.RunStartDateTime
									END)
									,(CASE
										WHEN ISNULL(r.RunStopDateTime) THEN srd.ScheduleFinishDateTime
										WHEN (r.RunStopDateTime IS NOT NULL) THEN r.RunStopDateTime
									END)) / 3600)
								,2) AS StdHrs
						,sd.FilmSize AS FilmSize
						,sd.FilmDesc AS FilmDesc
						-- start variable headers |
						
					,sd.Colors AS Colors
					,CASE
						WHEN ss.Repeat IS NULL AND (REGEXP_LIKE(sd.SleeveSize, '^[0-9]+\.?[0-9]*$') = 1) THEN FORMAT(sd.SleeveSize,4)
						WHEN ss.Repeat IS NULL AND (REGEXP_LIKE(sd.SleeveSize, '^[0-9]+\.?[0-9]*$') = 0) THEN sd.SleeveSize
						ELSE FORMAT(ss.Repeat,4)
					END
					AS SleeveSize
					,sd.Type AS Type
					,sd.PrintType AS PrintType
					,sd.FilmWidth AS FilmWidth
					,sd.FilmLFAvailable AS FilmAvailable
					,sd.ProcessPrint AS ProcessPrint
					-- ,'' AS Press |
					,'' AS BCD
					,'' AS PlateMaterial
				
						-- end variable headers |
						,1 AS Released
						,srd.Note AS Note
						,(CASE
							WHEN ISNULL(r.RunStopDateTime) THEN 0
							WHEN (r.RunStopDateTime IS NOT NULL) THEN 1
						END) AS Completed
						,0 AS NewSystem
						,(CASE
							WHEN
								(LEFT(RIGHT(sd.ReferenceItemNo, 2)
									,1) = 1)
							THEN
								6
							WHEN
								(LEFT(RIGHT(sd.ReferenceItemNo, 2)
									,1) = 2)
							THEN
								7
							WHEN
								(LEFT(RIGHT(sd.ReferenceItemNo, 2)
									,1) = 3)
							THEN
								8
							ELSE 0
						END) AS OperationId
						,-1 AS WorkOrderPass
						,-1 AS WorkOrderSequence
					FROM 
						(
							SELECT 
								srd.ScheduleReleaseId, srd.ScheduleId
							FROM 
								mes_custom.schedule_release_detail srd
							WHERE 
								srd.ScheduleReleaseID IN (
									-- Get the Max Schedule Release that has been released per Line per StartDate (Should be 1 or 2 for rolling week) |
									SELECT t.ScheduleReleaseId FROM (
										SELECT 
											sr.StartDate, max(sr.ID) AS ScheduleReleaseId
										FROM 
											mes_custom.schedule_release_detail srd
										INNER JOIN mes_custom.schedule_release sr ON
											sr.ID = srd.ScheduleReleaseID AND sr.Released = 1
										LEFT JOIN mes_lite.schedule s ON
											s.ID = srd.ScheduleID
										WHERE 
											sr.StartDate = '2023-01-01 07:00:00'
											-- Updates made it such that releases are only against 2023-01-01 07:00:00
											-- sr.StartDate >= '2024-08-15 07:00:00' -- Week Start |
											-- AND sr.StartDate <= '2024-12-04 23:59:59' -- Rolling Week End |
											AND srd.LineId = 1
											AND (s.NewSystem in (0,1) or (s.NewSystem is NULL AND srd.IUD = 3))
										GROUP BY 
											sr.StartDate
									) t
								)
								AND srd.LineId = 1 -- Need this because there could be multiple lines in one ScheduleRelease |
								AND srd.Active = 1
						) maxsr
						INNER JOIN mes_custom.schedule_release_detail srd ON
							srd.ScheduleReleaseID = maxsr.ScheduleReleaseID AND srd.ScheduleId = maxsr.ScheduleId AND srd.IUD <> 3 AND srd.Active = 1
						INNER JOIN mes_lite.workorder wo ON
							wo.ID = srd.WorkOrderID
						INNER JOIN mes_custom.schedule_detail_print sd ON
							sd.ReferenceItemNo = wo.WorkOrder AND sd.Active = 1
						LEFT JOIN mes_lite.run r ON
							r.scheduleId = maxsr.ScheduleId
						
					LEFT JOIN mes_custom.sleevesizing ss ON 
						ss.Gear = sd.SleeveSize
						OR ss.Repeat = sd.SleeveSize
				
					) AS t1
								
						INNER JOIN mes_custom.jobjacketstatuscurrent jjscurrent ON 
							jjscurrent.JobJacket = t1.ManufacturingOrderNumber
						INNER JOIN mes_custom.jobjacketstatusconfig AS jjsconfig ON 
							jjscurrent.JobStatus = jjsconfig.StatusValue
						LEFT JOIN mes_custom.workorder_checks as woc ON 
							woc.JobJacket = t1.WorkOrderNumber 
						LEFT JOIN mes_lite.run as r ON
							r.ID = t1.RunId
				-- Make sure duplicates do not show up when there are multiple runs |
				WHERE
					t1.ScheduleId NOT IN (SELECT schedule_id FROM mes_custom.vw_schedule_exception WHERE exception_state not in (3,5)) -- Don't show if any exception state other than cleared or rescheduled |
					AND woc.JobJacket != -1 
					AND woc.ManufacturingOrderID = -1 
					AND (
						t1.RunID IS NULL -- Not Run yet |
						OR
						r.RunStopDateTime IS NULL -- Currently Running |
						OR
						(t1.RunID IS NOT NULL AND t1.ScheduleStartDateTime = r.RunStartDateTime) -- Ran |
					)
				ORDER BY
					ScheduleStartDateTime ASC
			'''.split()).replace('--','\n--').replace('|','|\n')
